title: ​​​​Heartfelt Triumph: Uzair's Conquest Over CHD
body_text:
naib pesh-imam

“I thank everyone at PBS for AKUH for their help. I thank all the donors who provided support to us. Health is the biggest blessing we can have. As the Quran says, whoever saves a life, it is as if he saved the entire mankind."

“I was born with a hole in my heart, and always dreamed of playing like my friends could. Thanks to the Patients' Behbud Society for AKUH, Now I can play cricket and run as much as I want to!"​​
